message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.

Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. I would like to propose a price of $7500 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $8400. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this deal.
I understand your position, Alice. Let me see if I can come up with a compromise. I would like to propose a price of $8000 for the product.
